thread.title_full: Comments of the Week (fourth week of February 2017) | allkpop.com

title: Comments of the Week (fourth week of February 2017) | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Comments of the Week (fourth week of February 2017) By AllK_Maknae 1 hour ago 2,671 158 8 0 
BTS have been feeling the love from international fans.... but some are more extreme than expected. 
I'd be concerned because I'm sure the fans camped out for days on that boat and rolled on by like... 

If you can even call these people "fans," the comments beat me to it with the meme of the day. 
Our faces exactly. 
Jo Kwon always goes the extra mile to look ultra fab but one reader made an excellent point when it comes to imitating Lady Gaga's fashion sense. 
*Lady Gaga's reaction after revealing her secret* 
They don't call him the King of self-promotion for nothing. 
While some can find the joy in getting a limited edition JYP card, some feel quite differently. 
I'd only burn it if it were him in those horrid plastic pants. 
Every Red Velvet fan is awaiting a Pringles CF. Seulgi and Pringles are quite possibly 2017's biggest couple! 
"Pringles, Seulgi, Gimme that, Gimme that, your chips!" - See, I already started your CF campaign. MAKE IT HAPPEN! Pretty much sums it up: YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
